name: kohinoor-gemstone-backend
description: Backend API for Kohinoor Gemstone website

scripts.check-env: node -e "console.log('üåç Environment Configuration Check:'); console.log('================================'); console.log('NODE_ENV:', process.env.NODE_ENV || 'Not Set'); console.log('PORT:', process.env.PORT || 'Not Set'); console.log(''); console.log('üìß Admin Configuration:'); console.log('ADMIN_EMAIL:', process.env.ADMIN_EMAIL || 'Not Set'); console.log('ADMIN_NAME:', process.env.ADMIN_NAME || 'Not Set'); console.log(''); console.log('üóÑÔ∏è Database:'); console.log('MONGODB_URI:', process.env.MONGODB_URI ? 'Set ‚úÖ' : 'Not Set ‚ùå'); console.log(''); console.log('üåê Frontend URLs:'); console.log('FRONTEND_URL:', process.env.FRONTEND_URL || 'Not Set (using default)'); console.log('CORS_ORIGIN:', process.env.CORS_ORIGIN || 'Not Set'); console.log(''); console.log('‚òÅÔ∏è Cloudinary:'); console.log('CLOUDINARY_CLOUD_NAME:', process.env.CLOUDINARY_CLOUD_NAME ?
